section.p: Contains the Date and time and durationthe piece of Equipment was in use.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime with data type Time Interval
The date and time the surgical device was in use.
Contains exactly one [1..1] device, where its type is Surgery Device
